All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Broker
The Broker class represents a message broker that handles the communication between producers and consumers.
Client
The Client class represents a client that interacts with the shop system.
ClientOfferHandler
The ClientOfferHandler represents a client offers for products.
ClientProductsHandler
The ClientProductsHandler class implements the Handler and MessageListener interfaces.
Handler
The Handler interface represents a message handler that can start and close a process.
MessageHandler
The MessageHandler interface provides methods for interacting with JMS messages.
MessageHandlerImpl
The MessageHandlerImpl class implements the Handler and MessageHandler interfaces and provides functionality for handling JMS messages.
Product
The Product interface represents a product.
ProductImpl
The ProductImpl is implementation of the Product interface.
ProductOffer
The ProductOffer interface represents an offer for a product in a distributed system.
ProductOfferImpl
The ProductOfferImpl represents an implementation of the ProductOffer interface.
ProductsList
The ProductsList interface represents a list of products.
ProductsListImpl
The ProductsListImpl represents an implementation of the ProductsList interface.
ProductsOffersList
The ProductsOffersList interface represents a list of products buyers.
ProductsOffersListImpl
The ProductsOffersListImpl is an implementation of the ProductsOffersList interface.
RequestHandler
The RequestHandler class represents a request handler object.
RequestType
The RequestType enum represents the types of requests that can be made.
Server
The Server class represents the server component of the application.
ServerOffersHandler
The ServerOffersHandler class implements the Handler and MessageListener interfaces to handle server-side offers for products.
